page.title: 07Stoke Park Survey -results 6
page.content:
TRADE -locations where following goods and services are purchased.
Local Town Elsewhere Shops Ctr.
Everyday foods 82 41 16 Special foods 16 91 9 Clothes 3 117 9 Electrical 3 108 11 Furniture 1 95 19 Bank/Build.Soc 12 114 3 Insurance 4 82 3 Solicitor 2 93 7
It is assumed that "Elsewhere" includes superstores, hypermarkets, etc., on the fringes of town. Colchester and Norwich are also popular shopping centres. Cost and availability of car parking in Ipswich town centre may be a factor.
